c74object.name: tap.5comb~
c74object.description:
This object is a bank of 5 comb filters that can be controlled via messages or using a built-in graphical interface.
In the interface window you can edit all of the parameters (if you don't want to control them from outside the object). Additionally, you can store and recall presets. To store a preset chose a number in the number box at the bottom of the presets and click bang. If there is no file you will need to create one called tap.5comb.pref in the same folder as the 5comb patch. Then you can recall the preset at any time.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: Audio signal: sound to be processed.

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: List: Commands for controlling the filter bank.

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: Audio signal: the processed audio signal.
